title: Chocolate Cherry Bites
ingredients: ['125g unsalted butter, melted', '6 tablespoons golden syrup', '1 (397g) tin sweetened condensed milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1.35kg icing sugar', '3 3/4 (225g) jars cocktail cherries, drained', '350g plain chocolate chips', '1/2 tablespoon margarine']
